Directions: In a large bowl, beat 1 egg. Add the beef, potatoes, onion, salt and pepper; mix well. Shape into 12 balls. Beat remaining egg; dip balls into egg, then roll in the cracker crumbs. Shape each ball into a cone. In a Dutch oven or deep-fat fryer, heat 2 in. of oil to 375 degrees F. Fry croquettes, four at a time, for 2 minutes or until golden brown, turning occasionally. Drain on paper towels.
Ingredients: 1 pound ground beef, cooked and drained
2 cups cold mashed potatoes (prepared with milk and butter)
